content: remove stitch marker k2 repeat row 1 to 12 another 12 times you now have 14 completed cast off points repeat row 1 to 8 once more proceed to row 13 row 13 k6 drop next stitch yo k3 drop next stitch yo 14 times *see note at bottom of page* k to last stitch kfb switch to 3 50mm / us 4 needles and proceed to next section beginning with row 14 row 14 remove marker on this row kfb k all stitches and yo s to end row 15 k to last stitch kfb row 16 kfb k all stitches to end row 17 k to last stitch kfb repeat row 16 and 17 twice more cast off knitwise prepare for wet blocking as follows run finger down dropped stitches to create ladders at the same time poke finger through to tighten stitches on either side of each ladder using your preferred wet blocking method stretch out scarf and pin after pinning check to make sure ladder stitches are straight and stitches on either side of ladder are pulled tight allow to dry completely *the number of repeats should match the number of cast off points you have completed you may do fewer or more repeats if you want fewer or more ladders * ©copyright 2014 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern
